page.title: 08Education_Private.
page.content: {Pupils.}Hunmanby Hall is a Private fee paying school for Girls.It has a Methodist Religious foundation.There are about 330 students.The Girls come from many Countries,especially Africa,as well as the North of England.The fees are Â£3654 a year. {Lessons.}The girls have 8 lessons a day.Their activities include hockey, netball,badminton,tennis,swimmming etc.The girls work 34 weeks a year. {Buildings. }There are 50 acres of land.Most of the buildings have 4 floors.The school 1st opened in 1928. The Hall was 1st built in 1720 but the main school was built between 1928_83. In the school there are laboratories. {Teachers. }There are 32 full_time and 4 part time teachers.
